title: Design and Provision Azure Networking (VNet)
description: Define Terraform modules for Virtual Networks, Subnets (AKS, Data, Gateway), and NSGs.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Identity Layer
acceptance_criteria: VNet created; Subnets delegated; NSG rules active
definition_of_done: Terraform apply successful; Network reachability verified

title: Provision AKS Cluster with RBAC and CNI
description: Develop Terraform module for AKS including CNI networking and Azure AD RBAC.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Identity Layer
acceptance_criteria: Cluster provisioned; RBAC login working; CNI IP allocation correct
definition_of_done: kubectl get nodes returns Ready; Admin login verified

title: Provision PostgreSQL Flexible Server with PostGIS
description: Configure Terraform for PostgreSQL, Geo-Redundancy, Private Endpoint, and PostGIS.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Identity Layer
acceptance_criteria: DB accessible from VNet; PostGIS extension active

title: Create NestJS CI Workflow
description: Build reusable GitHub Action for linting, testing, and building NestJS apps.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Identity Layer
acceptance_criteria: Pipeline runs on PR; Artifacts generated

title: Implement Passport Azure AD Strategy
description: Configure NestJS Passport with Azure AD strategy to validate B2C tokens.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Identity Layer
acceptance_criteria: Tokens validated; Identity injected into request
definition_of_done: Unit tests passing with mock tokens

title: React Native MSAL Configuration & Linking
description: Install/configure react-native-msal, setup URL schemes for iOS and Android.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Identity Layer
acceptance_criteria: Library links; App builds; Redirect scheme registered
definition_of_done: App launches on simulators with MSAL initialized

title: Implement Mobile Auth Provider & Login Flow
description: Create AuthContext provider to handle login, logout, token acquisition.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Identity Layer
acceptance_criteria: User signs in via B2C; Token stored; Silent refresh works

title: Implement PostGIS Point-in-Polygon Query
description: Create TypeORM query to find Service Centers coverage based on user location.
acceptance_criteria: Identifies correct SC; Handles edge cases
definition_of_done: Integration tests passing with polygon data

title: Create File Upload Endpoint
description: Implement NestJS controller for multipart file uploads to Azure Blob Storage.
acceptance_criteria: File uploaded; Metadata saved; Event published

title: Implement OCR Processor Worker
description: Service to consume upload events and call Azure AI Document Intelligence.
acceptance_criteria: Consumes queue; Extracts fields; Retries on error

title: Define WatermelonDB Schema
description: Setup local database schema for Products, Warranties, and Sync Status.

title: Implement Synchronization Logic (Pull)
description: Develop logic to pull changes from backend and update local WatermelonDB.

title: Configure Native Location Permissions
description: Setup Info.plist and Android Manifest for background location services.

title: Implement Background Location Service
description: Integrate background-geolocation to capture coordinates when app is killed.
acceptance_criteria: Coords logged in background; Survives termination

title: Backend WebSocket Gateway for Location
description: NestJS Gateway to receive coordinates and broadcast to customers.
